UPLOAD_WARNINGS: Only PDF files are allowed, and the file size must not exceed 5 megabytes.

MODAL.TITLE: Do you want to publish the message dispatch sheet?

FORM_CHECK.TITLE: Check the box if it's the final/latest result

MODAL.MESSAGE: The result sheets are available in {{TOTAL_CENTER_COUNT}} centers, out of which {{APPROVED_CENTER_COUNT}} centers' results are in the message sheet. The results from {{CANCELLED_CENTER_COUNT}} centers have been canceled. After publishing this message sheet finally, you won't receive any new message sheets.
MODAL.MESSAGE_NO_CHECKBOX: The result sheets are available in {{TOTAL_CENTER_COUNT}} centers, out of which {{APPROVED_CENTER_COUNT}} centers' results are in the message sheet. The results from {{CANCELLED_CENTER_COUNT}} centers have been canceled.
